question: Amit Saroha, who has won silver at the 2017 World Para Athletics Championship, is associated with which sports?
explanation: Amit Saroha of India has won silver in the club throw event in the F-51 category (below waist paraplegic category) at the 2017 World Para Athletics Championships in London, United Kingdom (UK). The event is the equivalent of the hammer throw, only para athletes throw a wooden club.  Saroha is the former national-level hockey player,  who has been wheelchair-bound, after a horrific a road accident in 2007.
